name: The Grid Police
description:
Description:

This is a little prototype that I've made purely to test out an idea that I had. The premise is fairly simple. Run around, collect as many points as you can and survive. Every move you make costs you points, once you run out its game over. Also the grid police is chasing you.

Controls:
  • WASD (or arrow keys) to move
  • R: Reset the game
  • Z: Zoom camera in/out
